divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend and I were driving toward our storage unit in south Austin at around noon on Sunday, april 1st, 2007. We both noticed a brilliantly shining silver object flying very slowly at low altitude at a perpendicular angle to our course. It looked as if it was producing it's own light. We could not make out the shape of the object due to the shear intensity of the light it produced. We watched it for about 2 minutes when it quite suddenly disappeared before our eyes. It did not move beyond our range of sight. It simply faded over a period of 2 seconds, and then disappeared completely.
Summary: Bright silver light/craft disappeares before our eyes-- South Austin
